description:
Associate of the Maou of Earth and also a friend of Conrad. He lives on earth and transported the Great Sage`s soul (who ended up being Murata Ken) to Japan at the same time Conrad transported Julia`s. He became Ken`s pediatrician when Ken was younger and began to remember his previous lives. Later on he is seen working for the Maou of Earth.
Dr. Rodriguez is a pediatrician who loves Japanese anime and often travels to Akihabara to buy anime toys.
name: Jose Rodriguez
